snippet: After posting their first winning record in more than a decade last season, the Hoyas have been forced to use four quarterbacks in 2012, including a freshman.
abstract: Georgetown football team, which has been forced to use four quarterback in 2012, is in search of its second consecutive winning season; will close out their season at home against Holy Cross.
lead_paragraph: After posting their first winning record in more than a decade last season, the Hoyas have been forced to use four quarterbacks in 2012, including a freshman.

headline.seo: Georgetown Trying to Get Football Program Righted
headline.main: Obstacles Nothing New for Georgetown Football
headline.print_headline: Obstacles Nothing New for Georgetown Football
